channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Seattle-Tacoma Airport faces fuel shortage during Thanksgiving travel week

item.title: 10 real-world tips you need for flying this holiday season
